plot: At the same moment in time, a father and son go through the same thing: the men's lives are transformed by heart break. Without talking it over, the feelings of failed, thwarted love are written on both their faces.
title: Passe
plot_es: At the same moment in time, a father and son go through the same thing: the men's lives are transformed by heart break. Without talking it over, the feelings of failed, thwarted love are written on both their faces.
